Meet us at InterConnect '16
Join us at Booth #402 in the Solution EXPO
Miracle@Interconnect '16
 
Sessions, Labs, Workshops, and Sponsorships! We expect you to see us everywhere at this year's Interconnect '16. Miracle is once again going to be a Diamond Sponsor so don't forget to say Hi! to us at Booth #402 in the Solution EXPO. It's right by the entrance :)
 
With over 40 of us to attend the conference, we are going to speak in multiple sessions and even participate in the first ever Interconnect Academy as well! Check out some of our sellers who will be at the conference right below this message.
 
Wait a second, are you going to be at this year's Sales Academy? We will! Let us know and we can have a drink.
 
Find out more about what Miracle is doing at this year's event at www.miraclesoft.com/interconnect
